sentences.en: We should stop the importation of these birds which are sold as commodities and endure lives of boredom in cages.

sentences.en: While not legally binding the new levels allow countries to refuse to allow the importation of products with excessive levels of melamine.

trans.tran_en: the act of bringing something new or different to a place where it did not previously exist, or something that arrives in this way
